DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine rate oral genital human papillomavirus ( HPV ) infection , look risk factor HPV infection healthy mid-adult woman .
DOC.brief_title: Natural History Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Infections Mid-Adult Women ( WHIM )
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator propose longitudinal study 500 woman order determine rate risk factor HPV infection 30-50 year old woman . Participants follow 6 month ask complete online questionnaires health , sexual behavior , HPV vaccination , cervical cancer screening . The investigator ask participant self-collect monthly vaginal swab sample self-collect 2 oral swab sample . Women also ask provide 2 blood sample . All swab sample test type-specific HPV deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) use polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) -based assay , blood sample test HPV antibody .
